Detailed Description

A class for turning a byte stream into a character stream.

Data read from the source input stream is converted into characters by either a default or a provided character converter. 

 InputStreamReader

contains a buffer of bytes read from the source stream and converts these into characters as needed. The buffer size is 8K.

Member Function Documentation

void gaia::storage::InputStreamReader::close ( )

Closes this reader.

This implementation closes the source InputStream and releases all local storage.

int32_t gaia::storage::InputStreamReader::read ( )

Reads a single character from this reader and returns it as an integer with the two higher-order bytes set to 0.

Returns -1 if the end of the reader has been reached. The byte value is either obtained from converting bytes in this reader's buffer or by first filling the buffer from the source InputStream and then reading from the buffer.

Returns:
the character read or -1 if the end of the reader has been reached.
int32_t gaia::storage::InputStreamReader::read ( const base::Array< char16_t > &  buffer)

Reads the characters from this reader and stores them in the character array.

Returns the number of characters actually read or -1 if the end of the reader has been reached. The bytes are either obtained from converting bytes in this reader's buffer or by first filling the buffer from the source InputStream and then reading from the buffer.

Parameters:
bufferthe array to store the characters read.
Returns:
the number of characters read or -1 if the end of the reader has been reached.

int32_t  offset,
int32_t  length 
)

Reads at most. 

 length

characters from this reader and stores them at position 

 offset

in the character array. Returns the number of characters actually read or -1 if the end of the reader has been reached. The bytes are either obtained from converting bytes in this reader's buffer or by first filling the buffer from the source InputStream and then reading from the buffer.

Parameters:

offsetthe initial position to store the characters read from this reader.
lengththe maximum number of characters to read.
